website_summaries.verdict: Tops its competitors for its impressive feature set, effective sterilizing action, and value. Hands-down, the best available.
pros: Features a convenient accessory basket and memory setting
cons: It tends to leak if overfilled, and it's expensive – more than twice as much as the Dr. Brown's model

customer_reviews.title: great for CF medical parts.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to sterilizer my son's nebulizer parts. He has Cystic Fibrosis and that is very very important. I love that it works so well and has a dry setting so that it doesn't sit for hours with water sitting on it to build bacteria. Its amazing the piece of mind the product gives us a parents to know we are doing what we can to prevent added illness.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and work
customer_reviews.text: My boys have Cystic Fibrosis and we are constantly washing neb cups and other things to make sure they are clean and sanitary. We use our wabi at least 2 times a day! Very easy to use and work; press one button and walk away. It also helps that the CF foundation backs this device us to ensure that we are keeping our boys healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Blair L

customer_reviews.title: Works Beautifully if You Follow the Directions
customer_reviews.text: I used the Wabi for a full year and honestly think it is the best investment i've ever made. I was nervous based on some reviews and waited to review it because I didn't want to ginx myself. But this thing saved me HOURS of work from the microwave steralizer and always dried my bottles and breast pump parts no matter how much I stuffed in there. I would whole heartedly recommend the Wabi. Mine never leaked, never died, always worked exactly as expected; however I followed the directions perfectly and was VERY CAREFUL when filling with water. Do this and you will be do grateful for such a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mercury

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this when I was pregnant because I wanted to be able to sterilize my baby's bottles and pacifiers. Im very happy with this sterilizer. It is easy to use and very quiet. the sterilizer has various settings for the drier. It is very roomy and you can fit a good amount of bottles in there. Its super easy to clean. I come with various racks to put bottles in, and smaller items you need cleaned. Ive also used it to sterilize my baby's toys so I feel confident that they are clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tino kalantzis

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Perfect for Cystic Fibrosis
customer_reviews.text: **Update after 11 months of use** It will not turn on. Contacted Wabi for support, will update to let you know what happens. Bought this for my daughter's nebulizer cups, and its large capacity is perfect. Used it for bottles too and it works well. Easy to use and clean. Definitely recommended. Love that it has a dry and storage option for 12 hours so the cups aren't sitting there. First one that they sent had a shattered bottom, like the mail carrier had dropped it. They should probably add some styrofoam to the packaging. They sent a new one extremely fast, even before I sent back the old one! Was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Hippymama

customer_reviews.title: Good but unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The Wabi baby has worked well for us. We use it twice a day for my son's bottles. It sterilizes well and is reasonably easy to clean compared to a similar model we used. We were able to fit Dr browns bottles, comotomo bottles, and various pacifiers and spoons in it. The machines die about every 4 to 6 months. The warranty info from the company says that basically if it dies it's your fault. So be prepared to pay to replace them constantly. We are on our third.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for a working mom
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver. I am a working mom who uses dr brown bottles and still breastfeed. After one day, I have 4-6 baby bottles and 6 pumping bottles. (Which means I have about 50 parts to wash daily) and I need them again the next day. Instead of sanitize them and wait for them to dry, I just put them in here and do other stuff like cooking, laundry, having dinner etc. I have to run 2-3 times but it's so worth it. If you're on the verge, give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Lee

customer_reviews.title: OMG Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This could be the single most important baby product I own. I was pumping at work and sending breastmilk to daycare with bottles. Even when the baby was big enough that we didn't truly need to sanitize the bottles (really what's the point of sanitizing bottles once she starts chewing on the dog's ears), I still felt better sanitizing my pump parts. The drying feature is incredibly valuable. The footprint of this product on my kitchen counter is much smaller than the amount of counter space I would have needed to air dry everything overnight. Worth every penny. I wouldn't have been able to keep pumping/breastfeeding without it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat A.

customer_reviews.title: Asthma,bronchitis?...Wabi to the rescue!
customer_reviews.text: My family got a bout of flu then bronchitis and it was like round-the-clock nebulizing because several also had asthma on top of it all! This Wabi is a workhorse with sterilizing and drying cycles that automatically sanitized all the Pari nebulizer equipment when I needed it which was often all day and night! After the illnesses, we use it for anything A to Z that you want dried or steriled fast. For example I have plastic medication cups or syringes for the child that needed dried fast or a utensil or still wet items from the dishwasher or toothbrushes or jewelry. Wabi to the rescue!!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bee

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: We actually did a lot of research on sterilizes and dryers and this one is what we wanted and lots! It takes 15 min to sterilize and 45 min to dry.. super easy to set up, push one button and walk away from it while it does it’s job. It’ll tell you when it’s done and they are actually very dry when you remove the bottles! Holds a ton of items. I would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: B_West

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how others have issues
customer_reviews.text: Been using twice or three times daily for two weeks, no issues. Only complaint is small capacity, can only fit four tommy tippy bottles in the bottom section. No leaks, and using distilled water like the instructions say, no need to descale yet, plate looks clean. Don't use too much water (stick to 80ml like directions say) and don't use anything but distilled water and you won't have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dosmastr

customer_reviews.title: A dryer makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot to like about this product. It's not a huge eye sore on your counter, its fairly easy to use, and it has an adequate amount of space for items that aren't bottles. But the thing that makes this worth the price tag is the ability to dry your bottles as well as sanitize them. There's a difference between satanized bottles and dry bottles that feel ready to use. The only thing i don't love is that you can't set it to just dry. Sometimes i need things sanitized fast but could let other things dry if there was an option for that.
customer_reviews.author: Suburban customer

customer_reviews.title: Has changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest product that I didn't know I needed! We use it in our upstairs bathroom for cleaning night bottles. Between gripe water, formula, expressed breastmilk, dr Browns bottles and twins... We have a LOT of bottle parts at each feeding. This sterilizer is amazing and better than hand washing or th dishwasher because it also dries!! We just bought another one for daytime downstairs. We have put Dr. Browns bottles, medala bottles, snappier and pump parts in here. I especially like the top tray for nipples that usually have to be boiled. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Raegan Conlin

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This sterilizer is AWESOME! We had the dr. Brown one for a month and it totally stunk. First of all, the dr. Browns does not dry. So no matter what, your items are soaking wet when they come out. Second, the heating element on the dr. Browns burns the non stainless piece causing a nasty burnt smell all the time. The Wabi has a stainless plate so after dozens of uses -- zero smell and zero rust. It's very spacious, it dries perfectly, and sterilizes. For all your baby items, this thing rocks! A pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: 500 Internal Server Error

customer_reviews.title: It's an amazing product. I use it for sterilizing medical equipment ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this same model. It's an amazing product. I use it for sterilizing medical equipment and use it several times a day. Even with that kind of use, my last one worked great for 2 full years, until it eventually shorted out. I immediately purchased another one! I find as far as cleaning the minerals off the metal heating element, a little citric acid (food grade, found with canning or pickling items) and the cleaning cycle works great and is an easy process. :)
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: GO AHEAD AND BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this thing once a day for almost a year now and so far this has been great, still working and i haven't had any problems with it. If anyone is reading this, BUY THIS BOTTLE STERILIZER AND DRYER! don't waste your money with anything else. Don't listen to the negative reviews, at firt i was hesitant to buy this because of those negative reviews but I'm writing this now after almost using this product for a year. So go ahead, do yourself a favor and buy this thing.
customer_reviews.author: roberto jasmin

customer_reviews.title: So much space for all the bottles that are probably piled up in your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: My mom friends would tease me and tell me I didn't need a big bottle sanitizer. HA. HAHA. Wellllll, let me tell you how much I adore the wabi. After being a superstar mom all day, imagine yourself staring at a huge pile of bottles, you're tired... haven't showered, haven't eaten, spouse is working, and you just want to get it done and over with. This thing is HUGE and just fits everything and works so well. It dries everything so you're ready to go. Boom. Done. Drop mic.
customer_reviews.author: meow

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Poor product design, water easily overfilled and overfilled water will leak into the electronics circuitry and may cause electric shock hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Great product and highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this! It sterilizes all our bottles and breast pump parts well and everything comes out dry. Totally worth the price since our dishwasher does not dry, nor did we want to run our dishwasher that often. We use this about twice a day and it’s the size of a coffeemaker so it doesn’t take up a lot of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Heno

customer_reviews.title: Great for completely sanitizing and drying
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I research every single thing I buy extensively before it comes to my home because I want to be absolutely positive that it is the best fit for my needs and my family needs. That being said, easy to set up. Easy to operate. Easy to put away. Huge basket for many items at once. I feel good knowing my baby’s items are being fully sanitized and dry before using again. I really think this is the best model for this price and I highly recommend every pregnant Mom or Mom in general to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Works great, when it doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I ordered started to leak water all over my counter after maybe three weeks or so. Which was a shame because it did a really good job. So, I informed Amazon and they replaced it about a week and a half ago, I hope this one works out. If not, I'm sending it back and will be done with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: QAQC

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise I love it!
customer_reviews.text: My youngest has cystic Fibrosis so we use the wabi to sterilze his nebulizer parts. The wabi does hold much more than the baby breeza which we previously had. The only issue I’ve had is using the measuring cup exactly as instructed and our machine leaks during every use so I need to put a towel under it to catch the water. Otherwise I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: LElliott

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and not a extra job to clean up
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical because it cost a lot and I didn’t want to get a dud. However this thing is awesome. It streams and dries which is the most important part and all you have to do is load the items and clean the water area. It does not leave my counter soaked like other steamers and it’s fast.
customer_reviews.author: Shanta Solomon

customer_reviews.title: No more waiting hours for things to dry!
customer_reviews.text: As a full time pumping mom, I cannot say enough great things about this product! It is honestly one of the best baby product purchases I have ever made. Beyond the sterilizer, I love the drying capability of the Wabi. I pump once every three hours and not enough pump parts for a full day. Waiting hours for parts to dry before use was such a pain! It made the whole experience even worse. With the Wabi, I stick the parts in, and ten minutes later they are dry and ready for use! Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Immanuel I.

customer_reviews.title: Best Sterilization unit for CF treatment tools.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this sterilization unit. The dryer is priceless as I use this to sterilize my daughters breathing treatment kits/parts. It works beautifully, absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Best baby product purchase I’ve made since the birth of my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: Best baby product I’ve purchased since my daughter was born! We use doctor brown bottles as you know it has many little separate pieces, it drys every bottle part perfectly. Works great in drying Breast pump parts as well this is a must have on your baby registry list! Puts your mind at ease knowing there is no chance of mold or moisture in your babies stuff ie bottle, pacifiers, Breast pump parts,spoons sippy cups!
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give it 10 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Listen to others when it comes to preventing them leaks. This has been a lifesaver. It both sterilizes and dries (does it wash as some like to suggest). I have well water and sterilizing gives me peace of mind - and the Wabi is awesome. I can for LOTS of stuff (almost a days worth and i EP) and all of my bottles and parts come out clean (no spots!) and dry. And, the whole process takes less than an hour. Wish I could give this 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: My dishwasher gets too hot for my breast milk collection bottles and hand washing them and my bottle parts doesn't seem to totally get them clean. This sanitizer gets any left over film. Also, unlike both hand washing and the dishwasher, my bottle parts and bottles come out completely dry. As someone who lives in a sometimes high humidity city and generally runs this sanitizer right at bedtime, I really like this feature. I feel like the price is a bit high but otherwise would recommend this sanitizer over the non-drying versions on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Qster

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Wabi for around two months and am very impressed with how well it works. Using a drying rack my pump parts (especially the collection bottles) were never dry by morning. I can fit the flanges, connectors, valves, and screw tops in the top shelf easily. Without the middle shelf I am able to clean and dry my tall 8 oz glass storage bottles, as well as the smaller collection bottles I use at work. I have had no issues with the Wabi leaking on the counter. It does have a significant footprint in a small kitchen, but I think it’s worth the time savings if you are pumping at work daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this sterilizer over 16+ months and have no problem at all.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this sterilizer over 16+ months and have no problem at all. It does whatever it suppose to do and I have happy with this product. The only complaint might be it is not so easy to clean. You can watch YouTube and there are videos show how to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lin

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a waist of money but thought I would try it out. Best thing and worth the $100 or so. I used distilled water so there is very little scaling. Instead of taking the day to dry, now our bottles are sanitized and dry within the hour. We take this on the road with us and do not have to worry about having a microwave in the hotel room or bring a drying rack.
customer_reviews.author: Edward am

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’m an exclusive pumper and this sterilizer is the most convenient way I get all parts washed. It completely sterilizes in 15 minutes and if you want things fried it runs an auto dry cycle finishing both sterilizing and drying in 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Such a time saver. I know I know, ...
customer_reviews.text: Such a time saver. I know I know, you can boil your bottles and save money. But do you really? Boiling water takes time and $$ as well. This is a bit pricier than the others, but the drying feature in the long run is totally worth it. Fits the Dr Brown bottles which was a big plus since we got a few of those as gifts. Cleaning the boiler plate is a chore but if you owned a humidifier in the past you probably already expect this.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Very good machine
customer_reviews.text: Works very good I read alot of negative reviews saying it leaks I have never had a problem with leaks they must over fill it drying feature could be better I have been using it for several months with distilled water and have never had to clean the hot plate
customer_reviews.author: M.koenig

customer_reviews.title: The best sterilizer and bottle dryer you can get
customer_reviews.text: We have literally been using this device 3-4X/day for 14 months and will continue to use it. It functions great and no complaints. We do use Deionized water or distilled water so there are no water deposits or mineral stains.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Coleman

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have purchased this sooner. As a mom of a micro preemie in the NICU it’s imperative to keep my pumping parts as clean as possible. Waiting for the parts to dry to be able to store them was becoming very frustrating. The drying function along with the sterilizer has changed my life!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Works very fine
customer_reviews.text: Its a very nice gift for people that have a lot of kids and cant be washin bottles all the time. I used it for my kids very easy to use and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Mirelan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good but some of my tall Dr. Brown bottles can’t fit in...
customer_reviews.author: Hao

customer_reviews.title: Mainly use to dry all the bottles and pump parts ...
customer_reviews.text: Mainly use to dry all the bottles and pump parts because our dishwasher doesn’t. Saves so much time in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Have had zero problems with it! I do not use sink water with it I go to the grocery store and buy a gallon of water. It will leak sometimes but it depends on if I have a full load to sterilize or small. If I have a smaller load I use less water then the manual recommends and then it doesn’t leak. Kinda just have to find what works best. I recommend this product to everyone!! I can throw the bottles in when I wake up and their sterilized and dried by the time my baby wakes up!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love the steam and try features with different cycle length
customer_reviews.text: Love the steam and try features with different cycle length. It holds a lot of stuff, 6 bottles (mix of 4 oz Ameda, and 5 - 8 oz Medela), 2 pair of pump flange kits, 2 small bows and lids, 2 mini container cups, 5 spoons, 4 nipple heads, 6 bottle covers, and 2 teethers. It's on our three-thing-must-buy list if you're pumping and bottle-feeding.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wei

customer_reviews.title: This is the best sterilizer, look no further!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I tried pretty much every other sterilizer/sanitizer out there, we hated all of them but this one. This is one thing that is worth spending a little more money on, the bottles come out cool to the touch and dry when you use the dryer function. All other models we tried either didn't really dry the bottles, or the bottles really never seemed to dry. I wish we had just started with this unit and had not tried the others.
customer_reviews.author: Rand

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: Best one yet! Sterilizer and dryer at the same time no need to wipe my bottles. Plus it can load up to to like 10 bottles of 5oz its pricey but very worth it
customer_reviews.author: Momsieeee

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Baby Bottles!
customer_reviews.text: We use our Wabi daily and love it! No issues with it at all. Totally worth the money. Our daughter has cystic fibrosis and we have to sterilize her neb cups and this product has helped the neb cups last longer. And they look nicer too when we started to use the wabi.
customer_reviews.author: Leila Vecchi

customer_reviews.title: Saved me 2 - 3 hours of precious time
customer_reviews.text: Saved me 2 to 3 hours of sterilizing, but most importantly the drying time. I don't need to have my breast pump parts and bottles take up so much space on my counter. Yes this does take up some space, but it takes about 1 hour total for sterilizing and completely dries all bottles and breast pumping parts instead of 4 - 6 hours and if they aren't complete dry, I would have to use a paper towel. IF you use Dr. Brown Bottles, definitely would want this.
customer_reviews.author: LilWaif

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sterlizer!! Really wish I had gotten it with my first baby!! It sterlizers in less than 15 minutes and the drying option is the best!! I can fit bottles and pump parts in it and saves me lots of time especially after work! Since I have well water sterilizing is a must! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have known about this sterilizer and dryer from the beginning. I use glass bottles and I love that they are dry and I can put them together and in the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: No issues. edit: No issues after 3 years of use
customer_reviews.text: Edit: It is great. No issues after 3 days of daily use. Virtually daily use. No breakdown. Going strong. Great product. Very convenient. Much better than the below $30 models. On the expensive side but love the convenience. No leaks like other reviewers described. The bottom water try is deep. If you stick to the measuring cup you won't overfill the water tank.
customer_reviews.author: Jiayu Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great for donating milk
customer_reviews.text: Sanitizes your bottles for the next pump with no extra worries! Wonderful for donating milk to make sure all bacteria is clear
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Sanitizing and Drying in one package
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other sanitizers, you don't need to pull your stuff out to dry it. This feature alone is worth its weight in gold. Its push once and you are done. When you need clean supplies they are ready for you.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chen

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Dryer
customer_reviews.text: I was initially pretty skeptical of this items drying abilities. I had never heard of Wabi brand anything before, but I have to say I was pretty impressed. I can load up to 8/9 Dr. Brown's Standard 9 oz bottles in here no problem (including the pieces/nipples). It's holding capacity was much better than our "large" munchkin steamer, which has 3 different levels. The dryer function is awesome! everything is completely dry in 30 mins. No dripping bottles of breast pumps that i have to hand dry just to assemble anymore! Not to mention we were battling infant thrush and keeping things steamed and dried most likely helped us get rid of that problem.
customer_reviews.author: mamiof2

customer_reviews.title: A must have baby item. This sanitizer and dryer ...
customer_reviews.text: A must have baby item. This sanitizer and dryer has been a life saver!!!!! It allows me to spend more time with my baby!!! I used to spend a lot of time wiping the baby bottles and breast pumping pieces before I go to bed. Now my evening routine only requires for me to wash the bottle and breast pump pieces then put them in the Wabi and it takes care of rest. I wake up in the morning and the bottles and breast pun pieces are ready to be put away!!!! This is a must have Baby product!!!! All you have to do is set it and forget it!!! What a time saver!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SurfMama808

customer_reviews.title: so good!! I use this sterilizer/dryer 6-8 times a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good!! I use this sterilizer/dryer 6-8 times a day, as I am a milk donor for premature babies. So far it has held up wonderfully, is easy to clean and descale, and thoroughly dries all items. I have used many different sanitizers/dryers, and this is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Purcell

customer_reviews.title: Time saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Saves so much time not having to boil water to sanitize bottles. If it makes a continuous beeping sound make sure it is not plugged into a surge protector.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: If you are bottle feeding/supplementing BUY THIS. Seriously. It’s an easy way to feel secure about germs, has a number of settings, and fits all sorts of bottles.
customer_reviews.author: MomTeacherAmazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Very good size.
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! The time for drying is adjustable. Very easy to handle with big capacity. I can put 8 new born bottles into this along with my pump flanges.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great sterilizer and dryer.
customer_reviews.text: We love this machine since it can sterilize and dry the items inside. It was bigger than I thought and holds a lot of baby products. We also throw in water bottle parts while sanitizing the baby items. I wish I had this sterilizer four years ago when my first was born.
customer_reviews.author: dirtymonk

customer_reviews.title: Great timer saver
customer_reviews.text: I use this steamer at least once a day. Started using it for my old son and now using it for the new baby. It’s so convenient because it sterilizes and dries in one go. I used to microwave the parts then take them out to air dry. Not doing that again. Also, it could fit a lot more parts. I could fit 6-7 munchkins latch bottle and two sets of pumping parts in one go. Highly recommend for busy parents.
customer_reviews.author: Grace and Jason

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best purchase for our baby by far. We hand wash all our baby’s bottles etc.. We were having to wait for our bottles to dry for most of the day which you add in breast pump parts and it became overwhelming. After purchasing the Wabi we could sterilize and DRY 8 bottles along with all of the parts from our Dr. Brown bottles in 1 hour. The wabi is a must have imo. No more worries of getting behind. It will work with all breast pump parts also.
customer_reviews.author: helloDel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for the drying feature since the sterilization piece is gene really considered unnecessary if you use warm water and soap. It was taking forever for my bottles and pump parts to dry which meant I spent more time wiping tiny parts which is especially frustrating in the middle of the night. This works really well and you can load up the container (tons of space) and an hour later, you have perfectly dry and ready to use bottles. It's like having an assistant and I've saved tons of time and money on paper towels :).
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Baby Steam Sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this steamer. It is of great quality and easy to use. We have had no issues with it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David A Holland

customer_reviews.title: Wabi customer service is the best customer service department i have ever dealt with
customer_reviews.text: Wabi customer service is the best customer service department i have ever dealt with. The are quick, fast, curteous and just amazing. Their product is great too! I stand behind them 100% We've used several kinds of steamer and none of them have dried like Wabi...with twins i have bottles everywher and this is fast, clean and so sanitary. We just love it!!!!! Don't waste your money on anything less....get the WABI!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Hyun Jin Son

customer_reviews.title: Every mom needs this !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after my baby had arrived. It is great for Mom's that pump. I got so tired of needing to pump and it still being wet. Worth every penny. I would definitely give as a baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! We put everything in here- bottle parts, pump parts, teethers, utensils/ bowls, paci’s, toys. EVERYTHING. I love having peace of mind that everything is sterilized and not just washed. It’s the one item I didn’t know I needed until I got it. BUY IT! RUN DONT WALK
customer_reviews.author: Haylee Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Best overall
customer_reviews.text: This sterilizer has plenty of room for all of our nebulizer cups and masks, plus it dries them when finished sterilizing. Once you set the times on the first use, it’s as simple as pressing a button each day you want to sterilize. Set it and done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a great concept but there is a lot of room for ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a great concept but there is a lot of room for improvement, such as actually drying everything to completion. Its a bit clunky, so if you have a small kitchen/counterspace, this will be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This is the one baby product I absolutely could not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the one baby product I absolutely could not live without as a working mom. I have convinced other people I know to buy one as well. I can't tell you how much time I save sterilizing AND drying at the same time. My bottles would take forever to dry and were not nearly as clean without this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome & convoluted
customer_reviews.text: Intended to be a labor-saving device, but it created way more work than it saved! So many prerequisites and requirements to meet and so easy to break or fry the electronics, it's more fragile than the baby! The manual *starts* with a list of all the ways you can break it. Going back to boiling a large pot of water. Unit returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy; must-have for all new parents!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for all parents with little babies, especially ones who are bottle fed. The drying functionality is really useful and had it not been for it we would have ended up having to air-dry the bottles or even worse, wipe them dry. So far this is the most useful baby item we have purchased on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: AWS@Lekshmi

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. we use the dr browns bottles and i was not only able to fit all the bottles and nipples but the vent sticks and vent caps along with of the babys medicine syringes and her booger sucker. the drying feature was amazing.. Came diwn a hour later and put the bottles together. no residue or drying to do!! Amazing product!! No more leaving bottles out to dry or to use up more rags to dry!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Cost more than the Brezza but definitely worth it. I originally bought the Brezza, but, disappointingly, it came with a broken fan. Ended up returning that and decided to try the Wabi instead and loved it! Must have for pumping and/or formula mommies. I wash all the bottles, pump parts and load the Wabi before going to bed. Everything is sanitized, dried and ready to go the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Oak's Mama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I bought this to sterilize bottles and pacifiers for my little one with cystic fibrosis. So easy to use and clean! I plan on using it for nebulizers as well when we start them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mommy must-have!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this product for almost 2 years and it has been fantastic! We use it everyday; for the first few months, twice a day. You do have to de-scale it occasionally and we gives all of the parts a good clean down. We use vinegar and water to do this. In addition, I use a scouring pad to get off build up. Wonderful product! Eases into toddlerhood great!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Scott

customer_reviews.title: Mehh!
customer_reviews.text: Unless you plan on using only about 6 bottles TOTAL, you may want to just use the dishwasher, and the heat-dry option. I found this to be one more thing on the cupboard that didn't quite do the trick. Also, you have to be vigilant with the tiny surface of water that must be maintained at the bottom...if it ever runs out, it BURNS and looks like rust.
customer_reviews.author: MariaJA

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mom of 3 and just discovered this sterilizer for my third child. I wish I had known about it years ago! It is one of the only sterilizing products that sterilizes AND DRIES. I have used this product once a day for over a year and it is still going strong. Couldn't live without it.
customer_reviews.author: PharmDMommy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this twice for my friends and they both love it.
customer_reviews.author: PracticallyPicky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Electric Steam Sterilizer easy to use. It saves me a lot of time to dry bottles and sterilize them.It's a great product. The disadvantage is that the capacity is not very large.
customer_reviews.author: Kim jiang

customer_reviews.title: Love this. You need it. I promise.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is incredible. I just finally bought one as a milk bank donor. I wish I had bought this for use in feeding our first daughter. I use it for all of my pumping parts, sippy cups, bottle brushes, and Camelbak sports bottles. This is my new favorite 'Must Have Item'.
customer_reviews.author: MeeshTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product ever since I've bought it my son's thrush has been almost fully eradicated. The only downfall is I use tommee tipped bottles and Dr browns and those sterilizing together take up some space...and lately the sterilizer has been resetting my electric outlets in the kitchen for what reason I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: lacelover

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I like that it sanitizes the bottles and almost anything that is microwaveable. It comes in handy when I don’t have time to wash bottles. I usually run it once a day, it fits all styles of my bottles. It does require only distilled water, and citric acid to clean though
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: I love this steralizer and how it dries the parts as ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this steralizer and how it dries the parts as well. I use this daily. I previously had the Avent steralizer but had some issues with it and like this one better. The descaling function is nice and makes cleaning easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE for the first year!
customer_reviews.text: The best damn sterilizer I’ve ever had! It’s big and has lots of room to sterilize anything from bottles to plates (if you wanted to sterilize plates and forks, etc.). Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Welborn

customer_reviews.title: I love that everything is really dry
customer_reviews.text: I could rave about this. I love that everything is really dry !! I just love everything about this sterilizer!! So worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have Cystic Fibrosis and bought Wabi to steam sterilize my nebulizers...It's super easy and keeps them dry...So glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter so would be easier to sterilize her new baby boys bottles. Great alternative to having no dishwasher. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: MeMe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: A super easy and effective way to sterilize bottles and bottle parts. Easily accommodates my Dr. Brown bottles and parts as well as pump parts. I'm so glad I didn't go with the old fashioned method of boiling bottles and parts in a pot on the stove; I can push a button and not have to worry about a thing as the bottles are being sterilized.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What You Need
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have a 4 month old and needed a bottle sterilizer/dryer. We originally had the Baby Brezza one, which was pretty good until it broke. Customer service was non-existent, so we just returned it for a refund. I'm glad that happened, because we like this one even better. It's actually easier to load, plus you can set it so that you only ever need to press a single button to start the sterilization/drying process. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Ruzumna

customer_reviews.title: life-changer
customer_reviews.text: This is my single most favorite baby item. I breastfeed my son and have to pump multiple times per day while at work. Our dishwasher never really dries anything plastic- this does. With my first son, we spent so much time washing and drying pump parts and bottles. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Wabi!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably been one of my best baby purchases so far. When dealing with baby stuff, sterilizing is only half the story. You have to dry their stuff in a hygienic way too. And the drying needs to happens fast. Wabi was the only one that did both and was big enough to hold a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: JGT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use! Does a fantastic job!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd baby, but first time using a sanitizer. This one is very easy to use, quick setup, lots of room for odd shaped (pumping) parts. It’s also very quiet, and everything we put in comes out looking and feeling THOROUGHLY clean.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Works well but leaks
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for awhile. Now leaks out of base about a year later. Can't find where it's coming from though.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Sanitizes and dries perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. We used it every day for 3 years for nebulizer parts before we finally replaced it.
customer_reviews.author: Coreen

customer_reviews.title: Good product & custom service
customer_reviews.text: I like Wabi Baby because it's not only sterilize but also dry bottles & pump parts (which it's a big time saver). I used it on a daily basis (~twice a day) and it stopped working after ~10 months. I called & left a message to the custom service but they didn't call me back. I emailed them & they send me a link to fill out a form with some questions, After reviewing my request, they send me a replacement unit within a week. I'm happy to have Wabi back so my life would be less busy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: After dry the bottles, still left some water inside the bottles. Need to air drying again
customer_reviews.author: Candice Lin

customer_reviews.title: Broke With Less than 6 months Use
customer_reviews.text: Served well my twins, from premature to almost 6 months, when it simply stopped working despite all the maintenance efforts. Total disappointed with this high value product.
customer_reviews.author: mhlpenna

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Wabi! It’s so convenient to use as both a dryer and a sterilizer! I also bought the descaling powder which I use once a week. I wish I had this 10-15 years ago when my kids were babies. It’s definitely a lot easier than boiling the bottles and pump parts every day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Conlin

customer_reviews.title: Every new mom should have this
customer_reviews.text: I recomend this machine is worth paid the money Every new mom should have this .... I love this machine make my life easy you dont have to dry ur bottles I hate it w my first son ..
customer_reviews.author: Luisa  Hattermann

customer_reviews.title: easy to use n it dries too
customer_reviews.text: Never leaked, easy to use n it dries too, worth the prices. We got one for our friends who were expecting too.
customer_reviews.author: Lei Chu

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product - made the sterilizing process so much easier; I bought this for baby #2 who came two months ago and wish I knew about it when I had baby #1 two years ago. This will be my gift to expecting moms going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Seibel

customer_reviews.title: Dryer and sterilizer in one , easy to clean in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for newborn family. The sterilizer and dryer in one appliance really ensures that you keep the stuff directly in storage instead of keeping outside for fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Sampada Deshmukh

product_meta.title: Wabi Baby Electric Steam Sterilizer and Dryer Plus Version
product_meta.description: Color:BlueNew Plus Wabi Baby Sterilizer is the top of the line sterilizer you can find. A 4-in-1 sterilizer that combines steam sterilization, hot air drying, storage function, and one button descaling to give you and your baby the absolute best. Made for contemporary, on-the-go parents, our sterilizer is efficient and easy to use. Say goodbye to the time consumption and health risks that come with traditional open air drying. With one push of a button, you can have your products sterilized and dried within one hour-all with FDA food grade approved material to ensure a toxic-free environment. The wabi baby's sleek and modern design fits into the smallest of spaces, while still holding up to eight bottles at a time. Its versatility allows you to sterilize everything your infant needs, from bottles to breast pump parts, pacifiers to kid's dinnerware, and more. Let the wabi baby sterilizer help you find that stress free environment, with less time cleaning and more time for baby.
feature_bullets: Sterilizing: 8-15min; Smart sensor that auto shuts off when it's done
shake off excess water and do not load the bottles with the chamber sitting on top the base unit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars541 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
